Notes and Corrections:

  • Corrections to Physical Biology of the Cell.
  • Ursell et al. PLoS Comp Biol, 2007: The numerator of eqn. 14 should be z(0,1) + z(1,1), see the Arxiv version.
  • Corrections to Forces during Bacteriophage DNA Packaging and Ejection, Biophys. J. 2005 88: 851-866. In 'The Role of Lipid Bilayer Mechanics in Mechanosensation', the units in the legend of figure 2.8 should be k_BT/nm^2.
